headers.toc1: The Epistle of Paul the Apostle to the Philippians
headers.mt: The Epistle of Paul the Apostle to the Philippians

1: Paul and Timothy, servants of Christ Jesus, to all the ones set apart in Christ Jesus who are at Philippi, with the overseers and deacons.
2: Grace to you and peace from God our Father and the Lord Jesus Christ.

1: If there is therefore any encouragement in Christ, if any comfort from his love, if any fellowship of the Spirit, if any tender mercies and compassions,
2: make my joy full so that you are of the same mind, have the same love, are united in spirit, and have the same purpose.

1: Finally, my brothers, rejoice in the Lord.  For me to write these same things to you is not a problem, and they will keep you safe.
2: Watch out for the dogs. Watch out for the evil workers. Watch out for the mutilators.

1: Therefore, my beloved brothers whom I long for, my joy and crown, in this way stand firm in the Lord, beloved friends.
